===Statistics===
* According to the 2010 United States Census, ''Fuchs'' is the 2,784<sup>th</sup> most common surname in the United States, belonging to 12,958 individuals. ''Fuchs'' is most common among White (95.03%) individuals.

===Etymology===
From {{inh|gsw|goh|fuhs}}, from {{inh|gsw|gmw-pro|*fuhs}}, from {{inh|gsw|gem-pro|*fuhsaz}}, from {{inh|gsw|ine-pro|*púḱsos||the tailed one}}. Cognate with {{cog|de|Fuchs}}, {{cog|nl|vos}}, {{cog|en|fox}}, also {{cog|sa|पुच्छ||tail}}, {{cog|txb|päkā||tail, chowry}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{a|Zurich}} {{IPA|gsw|/fuxs/}}

==German==

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|de|/fʊks/}}
* {{audio|de|De-Fuchs.ogg|audio}}
* {{rhymes|de|ʊks}}

===Etymology 1===
From {{inh|de|gmh|vuhs}}, from {{inh|de|goh|fuhs}}, from {{inh|de|gmw-pro|*fuhs}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*fuhsaz}}, from {{inh|de|ine-pro|*púḱsos||the tailed one}}, from {{m|ine-pro|*puḱ-||tail}}. Cognate with {{cog|en|fox}}, {{cog|sa|पुच्छ|tr=púccha}}.

====Noun====
{{de-noun|m|Fuchses|Füchse|Füchslein|dim2=Füchschen|f=Füchsin}}

# [[fox]] {{gloss|animal}}
#: {{ux|de|'''Fuchs''', du hast die Gans gestohlen. Gib sie wieder her!|'''Fox''', you stole the goose. Bring it back again!|footer=''(line from a popular children’s song'')}}
# {{lb|de|informal}} a [[clever]] or [[cunning]] person
#: {{ux|de|Er ist ein ganz schöner '''Fuchs'''.|He is a really handsome '''fox'''.}}
# {{lb|de|informal}} a [[red-haired]] person or [[horse]].
#: {{ux|de|Unser Paul ist ja ein kleiner '''Fuchs'''.|Our Paul is a little '''redhead'''.}}
# {{lb|de|card games}} In {{m|de|Doppelkopf}}, the ace of diamonds, which earns a side of players an extra point if they win it from the other side
#: {{ux|de|Ich hatte nur vier Trümpfe und darunter beide '''Füchse'''.|I had only four trumps and among them were both '''aces of diamonds'''.}}
# {{c|de|Military vehicles}} {{lb|de|military}} a tank {{w|TPz Fuchs|lang=de|Transportpanzer Fuchs}}
# {{c|de|Plant diseases}}{{lb|de|archaic}} A form of [[sunscald]] on [[hop]]s.
#: {{syn|de|Röte|rote Lohe|Sommerbrand}}
# a [[fox]] in [[radiosport]] [[foxhunt]]
# {{lb|de|obsolete}}{{c|de|Coins}} any [[gold]] [[coin]]
